entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stavely
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
